description:
Gilles de Rais is a French nobleman who was once one of http://anidb.net/ch81069 [Jeanne]`s companions-in-arms, but was later executed for multiple cases of alleged murder, sodomy, and heresy. He possessed incredible strength and durability. He continued to accompany Jeanne to battle as a spearman, remaining loyal to her until his death.
He was defeated by http://anidb.net/ch83937 [Butch Cassidy] and the http://anidb.net/ch83936 [Sundance Kid], disintegrating into salt after that. An enraged Jeanne swears to avenge Gilles de Rais`s death. He is the first http://anidb.net/ch86430 [End] to be killed in the series.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Gilles de Rais
